pages.title: Fat Collector
pages.text: The <item>Fat Collector/$ makes <thing>liquid fat/$ using food. It only works in a certain <thing>$(l:intro/heat)temperature range/$. It has a <thing>$(l:intro/heat)heat/$ connection on the bottom and fluid connections on the sides.$(br2)Any food item (other than <item>$(l:fluid/fat_congealer)edible blobs/$) can be converted into <thing>liquid fat/$, which will consume a small amount of heat. The

total amount of <thing>liquid fat/$ produced from a food is based on the quality of the food- ((hunger restored) + (hunger restored)) is the <thing>value/$ of a food item. One <thing>value/$ is equivalent to 100mB of <thing>liquid fat/$ when consuming it.$(br2)The efficiency of the conversion from food into <thing>liquid fat/$ is based on the temperature of the <item>fat congealer/$. Between 100°C and 120°C, there is 80% efficiency (aka, 80% as much <thing>liquid fat/$ is produced as the food's <thing>value

<thing>/$ is worth). 120°C-140°C is 100%, <em>140°C-160°C is 120%/$, 160°C-180°C is 100%, 180°C-200°C is 80%, and above 200°C no <thing>liquid fat/$ is produced, but the food is still consumed (0% yield).
<thing>Liquid fat/$ can be made into custom food in a <item>$(l:fluid/fat_congealer)fat congealer/$, or used to feed nearby players and animals in a <item>$(l:fluid/fat_feeder)fat feeder/$.
